Average direction for each grid cell¶

See the flow between grid cells.

import simages

df = simages.generate()

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/justinshenk/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/sphinx_gallery/gen_rst.py", line 394, in _memory_usage
    out = func()

    exec(self.code, self.globals)

    df = simages.generate()
AttributeError: module 'simages' has no attribute 'generate'

Average Flow (3D)¶

Flow can be plotted by specifying the kind parameter of simages.plotting.plot_flow() or by calling the respective functions.

import simages

simages.plotting.plot_surface(df, bins=32)

Quiver¶

Quiver plot Additional arguments can be specified as a dictionary to quiverplot_kws.

simages.plotting.plot_quiver(df, bins=32)

Contour¶

Parameters filled and quiver are both enabled by default and can be disabled. Additional arguments can be specified as a dictionary to contourplot_kws.

simages.plotting.plot_contour(df, filled=False, quiver=False, bins=32)

Contour (Filled)¶

simages.plotting.plot_contour(df, bins=32, contourfplot_kws={"cmap": "coolwarm"})

Stream¶

cmap can be specified, eg, ‘coolwarm’, ‘viridis’, etc. Additional arguments can be specified as a dictionary to streamplot_kws.

simages.plotting.plot_stream(df, cmap="jet", bins=32)

Polar bar¶

simages.plotting.polar_bar(df)

Polar bar (histogram)¶

simages.plotting.polar_bar(df, overlap=False)

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.049 seconds)
